title: Bl3ss
text:
Bl3ss are a DJ and production duo based in London, England. They consist of DJs Joe and Flynn, who met while studying together at the University of Manchester and joined forces during the COVID-19 pandemic in the United Kingdom. When the pandemic's restrictions ended, they began DJing at house parties. They then performed in clubs and at festivals.
In 2024, Bl3ss released the song Kisses together with CamrinWatsin feat. bbyclose, which went viral and earned them a chart position in the German and British singles charts. In the British charts, it reached the top 10 at number 5 and was a hot candidate for Song of the Summer, but then only ranked at number 25. The song was also played at Tomorrowland.


== Discography ==


=== Singles ===
"Devil" (2022)
"Losing My Head" (2023)
"Kisses" with CamrinWatsin featuring bbyclose (2024)
"Craving 4 U" with CamrinWatsin featuring bbyclose (2024)
